dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.rights: No known copyright restrictions apply. See Agosti, D., Egloff, W., 2009. Taxonomic information exchange and copyright: the Plazi approach. BMC Research Notes 2009, 2:53 for further explanation.
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Alfred W. Thomson, Lawrence M. Page (2006): Genera of the Asian Catfish Families Sisoridae and Erethistidae (Teleostei: Siluriformes). Zootaxa 1345, 1-96: 17-17, URL:http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:25EFA792-7DA4-4E0D-A69A-12591B8422DE
dataObjects.description:
Erethistes jerdoni (Day 1870)

Hara jerdoni Day 1870a ZBK : 39, pl. 4 (figs. 2a -c). Type locality: Sylhet dist. , [Brahmaputra drainage] Bangladesh . Syntypes : (2) ZSI 431 (1).

Distribution: Ganges and Brahmaputra drainages, northeast India, Bangladesh (Hora, 1950; Husain & Tilak, 1978; Ataur Rahman, 1989; Talwar & Jhingran, 1991).
dataObjects.references: Alfred W. Thomson, Lawrence M. Page (2006): Genera of the Asian Catfish Families Sisoridae and Erethistidae (Teleostei: Siluriformes). Zootaxa 1345, 1-96: 17-17, URL:http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:25EFA792-7DA4-4E0D-A69A-12591B8422DE

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Occurs in slow-moving hill streams with sandy bottom (Ref. 4833), rivers and beels (Ref. 1479).  A very sluggish fish.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
